description: You have a project due on Monday afternoon, but your peers have invited you to attend a party with them. How willÂ you prioritize work or schedule time for unwinding? .

choices.text: Attend the party and work on the project later.
Skip the party and focus on the project.
Work few on project then attend the party.

description: A group project is closing to the deadline. The workload of each teammate is uneven and a meeting is suggested for reallocate tasks. How do you handle the situation?

choices.text: Take on more tasks to help the team meet the deadline.
Suggest redistributing tasks as member availability.
Focus on assigned tasks, let others manage workload.

description: It is going to have midterms in coming weekend and friend is invited to go for hiking. Will you attend the hiking or prepare for the midterms?

choices.text: Attend the invitation and study later.
Study the material and reject the invitation.
Study midterm early for reserve time for hiking.

description: A famous film has released and an assignment is nearly to the due date. How do you balance the leisure time and work?

choices.text: Watch the film and complete the assignment at midnight.
Complete the assignment first
Allocate time for both activities.

description: The application of oversea exchange, you are going to study abroad later. If a job offer is received at same time, what do you choose?

choices.text: Accept the job offer and cancel the exchange plans.
Process the plan and decline the job offer.
Negotiate about on board with the employer.

description: A volunteer Work is scheduled on this weekend, but there is a meeting with academic advisor at the same time. How do you choose?

choices.text: Attend volunteer work and ask to reschedule meeting.
Attend the meeting and reject volunteer work.
Reschedule by informing both parties.

description: A partime job offers extra shifts this weekend, but it conflicts with the family gathering. How do you handle this situation?

choices.text: Take the extra shifts and reject invitation.
Reject the offers and attend the family gathering.
Reschedule by informing both parties.

description: A new game is going to release within the period of examinations. How do you manage your time between gaming and studying?

choices.text: Schedule more time on gaming.
Study material and decline plans of game.
Allocate specific time for gaming.
